jodd.madvoc

Class WebApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.madvoc.WebApp
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PetiteWebApp

    public class WebApp
extends java.lang.Object
    Web application contains all configurations and holds all managers and controllers of one web application. Custom implementations may override this class to enhance several different functionality.

        public static WebApp get(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)

        public <T> WebApp registerComponent(java.lang.Class<T> madvocComponent,
                                    java.util.function.Consumer<T> componentConsumer)

      • registerComponent

        public WebApp registerComponent(java.lang.Object madvocComponent)
        Registers Madvoc component instance. Use with caution, as injection of components registered after this will fail.

      • withActionConfig

        public <A extends ActionConfig> WebApp withActionConfig(java.lang.Class<A> actionConfigType,
                                                        java.util.function.Consumer<A> actionConfigConsumer)
        Configures the action configurations.

      • madvocContainer

        public MadvocContainer madvocContainer()
        Returns Madvoc container that maintain all Madvoc components.

      • withRegisteredComponent

        public <T> WebApp withRegisteredComponent(java.lang.Class<T> madvocComponent,
                                          java.util.function.Consumer<T> componentConsumer)
        Configures a component. While the signature is the same as for registerComponent(Class, Consumer) this method does not register component, just operates on an already registered one.

      • router

        public WebApp router(java.util.function.Consumer<MadvocRouter> madvocAppConsumer)
        Defines a route manually using MadvocRouter.
